Question: Should patients with RA on oral MTX monotherapy 15 mg per week who are NOT at target increase the dose of oral MTX or switch to SC MTX?

Explanations.a: Downgraded by two levels due to very serious risk of bias. Lack of blinding and lack of allocation concealment.
Explanations.b: Downgraded by one level due to serious imprecision. Very small sample size.
Explanations.c: SC 20mg MTX for 4 weeks, then 25mg MTX for 8 weeks.
Explanations.d: PO 20mg MTX for 4 weeks, then 25mg MTX for 8 weeks.
Explanations.e: Downgraded by two levels due to very serious imprecision. Confidence interval includes both values suggesting benefit and values suggesting harm. Very small sample size.

References.1: Islam MS, Haq SA, Islam MN, Azad AK, Islam MA, Barua. Comparative efficacy of subcutaneous versus oral methotrexate in active rheumatoid arthritis. Mymensingh Medical Journal: MMJ. 2013;22(3):483.
